content: I lik it
Three stories but the are very short. There are better quality games out there for less money with WAY more content. Overall not terrible game but overpriced.
It is a fun game, shame the Easter eggs don't work anymore
I was debited twice for a game I paid for once and the debit was not refunded up till now, been almost a week.
Love Fire Maple Games so much.
Love these best ever need new games played all
Amazing game!
I payed money for this and there are games missing from the pack
Well worth the money.
After all these years I still come back to see if there are any new games. And they will always be my favorite.
Fantastic!

great game the only downside to it is that I've played all 3 of the games so many times they are very easy the hardest one is the hidden world the graphics could be better but with the age of the games i get that the graphics might be bad other than that great game it's also better than paying full price on each of the games individualy
wonderful games
I love the games from fire maple games. I download them, play them and it gets the brain working. Once i finish I'll uninstall it but I always install it again every 4-5 months. Still enjoyable.
very good
3 great games for 1 great price! Hope more of these little games come out!

Navigation throigh the individual games is cumbersome. I'd rather spend my energy solving puzzles than trying to remember the paths and where certain items were. I also don't like the hints (especially for the Lost City), nor having to wait for 10 minutes of in-game time between them. If you must have a delay between showing hints, why not just let 10 minutes elapse outside of the app? Game is beautiful, and some of the puzzles are interesting.
reinstall as soon as there's space
Outstanding point&click adventure with hidden and puzzles and explorarion. 3 are games included in this. Enjoyed a lot, beautiful artwork, and worth the price.
The lost city is a f'in joke. Sooooo much back and forth that u can't even understand what to do without the hint button. The other two games are good.
Great games
I love it

The games don't work on my Asus flip. Touching any option on the screen 
minimizes the game - a serious problem for a point and click! I hope they 
patch this bug soon, as these look like a delightful series of games.
I loved playing this collection while I was feeling bad. It keeps your mind busy and it's very relaxing.
Awsome
These are my favorite games and I've played then before and was happy to play them again but I've gotten to the globe part of grisly manor and it won't open.
An excellent series  of games. A joy to play.
Good gameplay, but I can't get to the second screen of items in my satchel and now can't continue. If this gets fixed, I will give it 5 stars.
Good fun.. overall a bit too short.. otherwise all three were very enjoyable
I used to play the lost city with my sister.  And I love how you can change the seasons. And the other three are just as amazing !
I love these games and they are so much fun for me to play when I'm bored. 😊
DiE
awesome
Lost City - loved it!! Grisly is fun, but a bit short. The hidden is not my fav, but that is due to magic / sorcery.
Really enjoying these games. Only problem is that I can't scroll through my inventory because the buttons in the lower corners of the screen overlap the inventory arrows.
Not to hard, but not too easy, great themes, each game I'd unique... Great fun for the price!
its great game world no 1 game .thakn u fire maple game team.i love this game and please related game more ....
Please make more

Anything by this developer is fantastic. So it is great they have done this bundle. My favourite developer out there and grisly manor was my first adventure game and is what made me fall in love with them.
So far this game is great for me and my 10 year old grandson.  At first it had a problem but it was fixed by the developer so quickly that we hardly missed a beat.  Thanks for the help and the game.
Good value for 3 games. Some parts get a little repetitive but the progression through the game keeps you hooked. Finished 2 of the 3 & looking forward to the last one!
Loved it!
Love this
There should be more games available,   or sequels.
I've completed them all and thay are all unique in their own ways. Love the game!
Love it amazing collection
Lovely style. Challenging but not impossible, nice how the hints are given out and solutions are there if youre really stuck but the odd hint is more than enough.
3 entertaining puzzle games for the price of one:)

Great games, I really love them, but way too short! I finished all three games in a day. The stories are great, very "Mortimer Beckett", but you could take the games into a much bigger story line than you already have.  I had a similar problem as some with the "licencing" thing, but once I closed and restarted the app everything worked fine.  Keep up the good work.
I installed this game and it wouldn't install right. I tried to get a refund and it won't let me and it wouldn't install right on my phone. Total crap.
Great games but for some reason it won't load up anymore. Can you fix this

Perhaps the game is a bit outdated. The graphics are OK but not up to par with nowadays games. The gameplay is very predictable, but still OK for children. Very average. Controls and stability are good.
Good, but need a feature that'll allow you to jump to a location on the map by opening the map and clicking on the room\scene\location you want to go

I have all these games on my Kindle and enjoyed them enough to purchase for my tablet. The graphics are pretty good and it's  challenging enough so it's not boring. Looking forward to more from Fire Maple Games.
There amazing. Please make another one or loads more!
Keeps giving me a download error, wasted my money.
Great adventure games without all the annoying hidden objects. You get 3 great games for price of 1 $1.99 game. Great value.

Though each one of them is a bit too short (for my taste), one can't complain when this is 3 games in a bundle. Graphic is well done, navigation is easy, and performance is very good on a fairly decent phone. The only glitch I found is, the scrollbar for bag is too close to home button, so people can quit game mistakenly.
I enjoyed it but it was really easy, finished it quickly
Great one
Engaging but not difficult. Good casual game.
Unable to scroll through  my inventory as the satchel and the options button hides the scroll arrows.  Game is unplayable.  Galaxy tab s2
Played better. Good graphics but average. Not interested in finishing..
All 3 games in one collection for a bargain price - fantastic!

I have replayed this a lot of times and I have to say it never disappoints and it's get me everytime. If you love an adventure and puzzles than this is the game for you there kind of games aren't known for story telling well it's more like puzzles are telling the story.
One of the few best point-&-click puzzle game i've ever played. But am i the only one who found all 3 easter eggs in those 3 game? What do the numbers mean?
Horrible
great.. I love it
Cool and challenging
This App will not work on my android device. Paid for and no game.
Best puzzles ever this colletion is a great deal and I've only played grisly manor yet, however I want,  no need to try the others. 😄
Loved these games fun & entertaining
Love all of them   please make another one
Awesome games it's a steal
More like sample games.
LOVED the gameplay, but hate the fact it crashed (like April's review) and now won't reopen! Sort it please FMG!!!!! Then I can give it the five stars it deserves.

Very engaging and well done. Grisly manor was over in less than an hour but was enjoyable. The other two were a couple of hours but kept my attention. Good games ! Also it is nice to have 3 packaged together. I wish more developers did that, so thanks!
Enjoyed all of them. Hopefully more games to come. Thank you

All three games for 199 is totally worth it. All of them are very well done, and decently long. Puzzles are fun, unique, and just challenging enough to make you think but not frustrate you (for an adult, kids might need help solving them). The only thing I really wish was different is the maps. There are SO many locations and it gets a little annoying to go back and forth. Make the maps clickable so you can instantly travel from one spot to another!
Kept me wanting to come back to solve the puzzles. Good work!
Its a fun game
My favorite was The Lost City. The next best is The Hidden World. Grisly Manor was fun, too, but the other 2 are better.
Fun but short :(
Would have loved a few more puzzles and longer story lines, but loved the games!

They're like room escapes, The Room, or, distantly, Myst, in style if not depth. Less animated, but still engaging. A worthy use of a few hours. Alas it will not let me rate them on their individual pages; I liked Lost City best, mostly for the aesthetics.
Love the storyline & the puzzles. More please :)

I try to open the app and just get this cut off, oversized message that says something about downloading resource files, and then an error pop up that says "Licensed."  Also, I had to agree to the $1.99 payment, then my download was interrupted due to insufficient space. I cleared space & re-downloaded, & now there's no option to refund.
Do not buy!!! Won't open on tab s with updated software.

I've completed all 3 and enjoyed them all. Good puzzles, good hints although I try not to use them. Would recommend all three games but must say they are quite short especially secrets of GRISLY MANOR. Overall  they are really good

Great value for money, I had played the lost city before, but this did not spoil the enjoyment. I read some comments about hints taking too long as they are timed, this is a good thing as the whole point of the games is to solve the puzzles yourself. Hints should only be used when you have exhausted everything you can think of to solve the puzzle and failed. Really great games I would recommend to everyone.
Have paid for but not received same.  Tried several times to no avail. Disappointed
Recommend!!!
The stories are short. However, some puzzles are quite enjoyable.

But man does the home button in the bottom right annoy me to no end.  Anytime I try to right scroll my inventory I hit home.  The buttons are literally on top of each other.  Why is it even needed?  Our phone basically already have this button.  Derp
Excellent!

I like to play on my tablet going to and from work on the subway and, if I do with these games, it says "license check failed". What the Hell? I paid for them, but I can't play them! FMG, any response??
Absolutely love everything about these games. So well put together. And great vfm. Hours of fun.  Well done. Looking forward to more like this.
Meh, not as good as the room, save your money, not really a challenge, just time consuming.
Short but sweet - some games shorter than others, preferred the lost city over the others.

I have completed The Lost City before, but enjoyed it so much that I want to play it again. Grisley Manor I got stuck, never could get past the shed outside. Going to give it another try. More hints are needed, or at least a way to get unstuck.Please make more games. Great Quality!
Got through two of the games just fine. Went to play the 3rd and it shut my whole phone down. So uninstalled
Thanks FMG!
Simple, enjoyable suite of games. Finished them in a few hours each but they were a fun little challenge and def worth a few dollars. Please make more, Fire Maple Games!
Great little puzzle games. I admit, I used the help feature often. Great artwork. It's like reading a good book. Go back through it at a later time!
Nice bundle of short games. The puzzles are fun, although not overly challenging.
It is great having a game that makes you look for clues and figure things out to solve mysteries. Best is the clues you can get after enough time to search and not loose interest.
Good value. Easy way to while away some time.Just challenging enough to keep your interest.
Love
Great to have all three games in one shot. My only two complaint is that they were all way too short and the "hints" were full on solutions. Over all well worth the money.
I loved the puzzles but what a waste of money I finished all three "adventures" in 24 hours...
Game starts now thnx...but waitkng 4 hints,if u dont sit there with game on watching clock it stops running....doesnt make sense and is a waste of time....
Played this on my Samsung galaxy 4 and it was awesome. No bugs or freezing. Loved these games!!!!

userName: องอาจ กาญจนเมธีรัตน์
content: Nice quanlity games
Played for 30 minutes on Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 then app crashed and won't reopen.
I just bought this game ....played for an hour turned it off and now it will not turn back on.... will give a better rating when I can play ..Help
Could be longer though, this only took me about 4 hours total to complete.

The games in this pack are beautiful and fun.  Make you definitely think, but also aren't impossibly frustrating.  When I reported a bug, the developer was quick to respond and work through the issue.  Great buy!
Being able to get all of these games all in one collection is great! These games are so much fun to play. Can't wait for the next game to be released! Keep up the fantastic job FMG team!
I have grisly manor, but now I have all three in one. Looking forward to playing the other two.
